comments.body:
You can use the following for skipping Windows:
```suggestion
  number: 0
  skip: True  # [win]
```

Or if you only want to skip VC 2008:

```suggestion
  number: 0
  skip: True  # [win and vc<14]
```

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +11,15 @@
build:
  number: 0
  skip: True  # [win]
  script: "{{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . --no-deps --ignore-installed -vv "
